message.content:
I need to identify the specific line items and value of cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement provided, I can see that under "Cash Flow from Investing Activities" there is a line item called "Purchase of Fixed Assets" with an amount of 251793.02. This is exactly what I'm looking for - purchases of fixed assets represent cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment.

The value of cash payments to acquire property, plant and equipment and other long-term assets is 251793.02.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '251793.02'}}
```
